product_overview: Domcy Coffee Online Ordering is a responsive web application that allows customers to browse a curated menu of coffee products, add them to a shopping cart, and place orders to be finalized via WhatsApp. The app features an animated and interactive user interface, seamless navigation, and an integrated location map for store information.
core_goals: Provide customers an intuitive and engaging way to browse coffee products and view detailed descriptions and prices.
Enable easy state management for shopping cart operations including adding, removing, and updating coffee orders.
Ensure a smooth ordering flow culminating in order confirmation and directing customers to WhatsApp for finalization.
Create a responsive navigation experience that works well on both desktop and mobile devices.
Display the physical store location interactively on a map for customer convenience.
key_features: Shopping Cart System with React Context to manage coffee orders, including add, remove, and quantity update functionalities.
Menu Display presenting coffee items with prices, descriptions, and interactive 'add to cart' buttons.
Animated UI Components utilizing Framer Motion for smooth floating images and entry animations to enhance user engagement.
Responsive Navigation comprising a navigation bar and mobile-optimized floating menu for accessing site sections.
Order Process flow featuring a modal for pre-order confirmation and integration with WhatsApp for completing the order.
Location Map integration using React Leaflet showing the Domcy Coffee store location interactively.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and views the coffee menu with item details and 'add to cart' buttons.
User selects coffee items and quantities, managing the shopping cart dynamically via context state.
User accesses the cart and proceeds to order, triggering a PreOrderModal to review order details.
Upon order confirmation, user is directed to WhatsApp to finalize the order.
User navigates the site using the top navigation bar or mobile floating menu to explore sections including the location map showing the store.
User can interact with animated UI elements enhancing the browsing experience.
validation_criteria: Shopping cart correctly reflects added, removed, and quantity-updated items in the UI and state.
Menu items display accurate prices, descriptions, and respond correctly to 'add to cart' interactions.
Animations function smoothly on supported devices without performance degradation.
Navigation components are fully responsive and transitions work correctly on desktop and mobile views.
Order process correctly captures order details and opens WhatsApp with prefilled messages for finalization.
Location map accurately displays store location and allows user interaction such as zoom and pan.
